p: Little is still known about an association with reproductive system. ACE expression in testes poses patients at risk of orchitis. Pathologic analyses of testes of six patients who died of SARS revealed widespread germ cell destruction few or no spermatozoon in the seminiferous tubule, thickened basement membrane, and leukocyte infiltration. It further suggests that the reproductive functions should be followed and evaluated in recovered male SARS patients [ 18] .
